section.title: Adding Block Storage nodes
section.para: When your OpenStack Block Storage nodes are separate from your compute nodes, you can expand by adding hardware and installing the Block Storage service and configuring it as the other nodes are configured. If you use live migration, ensure that the CPUs are similar in the compute nodes and block storage nodes. In cinder.conf on each block storage node, set the option --iscsi_ip_prefix= nnn.nnn.nnn.yyyÂ to register every node in the cinder database.
